text:
March 31, 1965
Mies Harriet Lundgaard
Administrative Assistant
Educational Media Council
250 West 57th Street
New York, New York 10019
Dear Harriet:
Mary Lynn has just said "everytime we have a dictating session,
we write to Harriet Lundgaard.‚Äù
We will be pleased to have the 1,000 copies of the C.P.X.
newsletter. As indicated earlier, they should be sent to
Mrs. Dorothy Templeton in OSrbana, and we will distribute
them as far as they will go.
Regards,
Harold E. Hill
HEH/mlm
cc: Mrs. Betty McKenzie
Dear Betty: Let's send them to all institutional members
